title: Godzilla
description: For thirty years, the King of the Monsters has slept off the shores of Tokyo. But now he's back, and he's looking to make up for lost time! This 200-page manga epic adapts to English the Kazuhisa Iwata graphic novel. Featuring an afterword on the big lizard's film history, no manga, monster, or movie fan will want to be without this critical collection! Cover by Hugo Award-winning artist Bob Eggleton!
author: Kazuhisa Iwata
